The House of Many Tomes was one of the largest and most renowned temples of Oghma in all of Faer√ªn, located in the town of Songhal in Impiltur. It was considered among the sages of the Realms as a great place of learning, that brought significant prestige to its home town.
The main road leading up to the House of Many Tomes was surrounding by serene grasslands and well-manicured trees. The temple itself featured a number of columns, massive front doors and a massive stained-glass window that resembled Oghmas holy symbol.Some descriptions based on the artists rendering.
Just outside the entrance, beyond the central walkway, was a single-tiered amphitheater.
